Headline: 63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted: 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted: 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Chicago
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses temporarily rrted SB: Cicero, Chgo, Augusta, Laramie, Chgo, & Cicero; NB: Cicero, Chgo, Kostner, Augusta, & Cicero near Cicero/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Cicero/Chicago.

Southbound buses will operate via  Cicero, Chicago, Augusta, Laramie, Chicago, & Cicero.

Northbound buses will operate via Cicero, Chicago, Kostner, Augusta, & Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.
